join: Forces the bot to join the same voice channel that you are in
leave: Forces the bot to leave the voice channel it is currently in
list: Displays the complete list of songs that are ready to be played
pause: Pauses the playback of the currently playing song
play: Starts playing the provided song in the current voice channel.
restart: Restarts playback of the current song from the beginning
resume: Un-pauses the playback of the current song
skip: Skips the current song, immediately starting whatever is next
stop: Stops playing any music and empties the song list
shutdown: Forces the bot to disconnect from the server and shutdown
serverinfo: Displays information about the server we are connected to
